REWRITE_MAX_PASSES.rule: S4: maximum rewrite iterations before forced accept/reject
REWRITE_MAX_PASSES.derivation: Empirical: 3 passes sufficient for convergence. >3 = diminishing returns.

NECESSITY_MIN_RATIO.rule: S-INV-04: at least 85% segments must be necessary (ablation test)
NECESSITY_MIN_RATIO.derivation: Phase Q calibration: below 0.85 indicates padding/filler

BANALITY_MAX_COUNT.rule: S-INV-08: zero cliches, zero IA-speak, zero banned words
BANALITY_MAX_COUNT.derivation: Zero tolerance: any banality = weak text = FAIL

STYLE_DEVIATION_MAX.rule: Style genome deviation must not exceed 30% on any axis
STYLE_DEVIATION_MAX.derivation: Voice consistency requires tight bounds. >30% = voice drift.

EMOTION_PIVOT_TOLERANCE.rule: S-INV-06: emotion pivot must be within +/-0.2 of target intensity
EMOTION_PIVOT_TOLERANCE.derivation: Emotional precision: allows natural variation without drift

DISCOMFORT_MIN_FRICTION.rule: Every scene must contain at least 1 controlled friction point

QUALITY_MIN_DENSITY.rule: Information density must exceed 70% (meaningful content / total words)
QUALITY_MIN_DENSITY.derivation: Below 0.7 = verbose. Above = dense enough to reward close reading.

TRUTH_MAX_UNSUPPORTED.derivation: Phase Q standard: every claim maps to canon or plan

IA_SPEAK_PATTERNS.rule: S-INV-08: IA-speak expressions forbidden in output text
IA_SPEAK_PATTERNS.derivation: AI-generated text detector: these patterns betray non-human origin

CLICHE_REGISTRY.rule: S-INV-08: cliche expressions forbidden in output text
CLICHE_REGISTRY.derivation: Quality standard: cliches indicate lazy, predictable writing

MIN_SENSORY_PER_SCENE.rule: Each scene must have at least 2 sensory anchors in output text
MIN_SENSORY_PER_SCENE.derivation: Concrete imagery requirement: abstract prose = weak prose

MOTIF_RECURRENCE_MIN.rule: S-INV-05: each seed must appear in at least 2 paragraphs (plant + bloom)
MOTIF_RECURRENCE_MIN.derivation: Chekhov's gun: a motif planted must bloom visibly
